name: Springtide Storm
effect:
Wind Based. Roll 2 Chance Dice to reduce the target's Strength and Special. -2 Accuracy. 
 At Silver Rank, increase this move's power to 2.
 At Gold Rank, roll 2 Chance Dice to reduce the target's Dexterity by 1.
 At Platinum Rank, increase this move's power to 3.
 At Diamond Rank, double this move's chance dice amounts.
description: A gentle breeze suddenly turned into a maelstrom of love. It hurts a lot, but it hurts in a good way~
